title: Warehousing robot maker turns to lubrication-free motion plastics
description:
Bastian Solutions needed rugged and reliable bearings for its warehousing robot to load trucks, so it turned to igus motion plastics.

The post Warehousing robot maker turns to lubrication-free motion plastics appeared first on The Robot Report.
